message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. I get $60, you get $40.  Think it over -  inflation is no joke!
Let's try to find a middle ground. I think 55-45 is a fair split, considering inflation is affecting you more than me.
I understand the impact of inflation, but your offer was too low. Let's be fair - I'll take a smaller cut than my initial proposal. $57 for me, $43 for you.
Considering the inflation is hitting you harder, I think it's only fair that I get a slightly larger share. 58-42 seems reasonable to me.
Bob, we're running out of time and the value keeps dropping. I'm willing to compromise further, but this needs to be reasonable.  I propose $54 for me and $46 for you.
With inflation hitting you harder each round, I think it's time for me to take a firmer stance. 60-40 is my new proposal. The longer we wait, the less your share will be worth.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. I'm offering a 50/50 split to end this now.  Take it before inflation eats away at the value even more!
